body.name: Mini Portable Speaker, 3W Mobile Phone Speaker Line-in Speaker with Clear Bass 3.5mm AUX Audio Interface, Plug and Play for iPhone, iPad, iPod, Tablet, Smartphone
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 1 hr 27 mins
features: 【Plug and Play, Easy to Use】Customers who use the line-in speaker do not need to download any apps, do not have to wait, plug in the phone to use. (Please confirm your device supports 3.5mm jacks before purchasing. iPhone 7 and above models, please make sure you have a Lightning to 3.5mm cable. USB-C android phone, please make sure you have a USB-C to 3.5mm cable.)

【Compact and Neat, No Wires】The size is 1.8*1.8*1.3 inch, you can enjoy music with loud volume anywhere. Super portable and convenient! Nice gift for kids, friends and family. Perfect as new year gift, birthday gift for beloved one! Also good for the elder, the hard of hearing.
【High Sound Quality】This mobile phone speaker with a 3w speaker in 4ohm and SNR>80db to keep the high sound quality with clear bass, can maximize the volume up to 4 times.
【Power Saving and Durable】 Does not consume mobile phone power when playing, and lasts for long time. Once drained out, only 45 mins needed to get a full charge through the micro USB port.
【Perfect Compatibility】 Compatible with any media device with a 3.5mm jack such as mobile phone, tablet, MP3, CD player, laptop, just turn power on and plug it directly to play music or video audio.
body.description: Description :-- Stylish design,basic phone speaker, decent holiday gift.-- Ultra-lightweight and portable,golf size speaker.-- Quick access, just turn on speaker and plug into 3.5mm audio jack, no Bluetooth pairing, no waiting.-- Simple to use, even for the elder or kids. English user manual, easy to check.-- Clear sound with powerful 3W output, enhance your sound experience anywhere you go.-- Charging with micro USB cable-- Works with all Cellphones| Windows Phone | MP3/MP4 Player | iPad| iPod | TabletSpecification :Color: BlackS/N: >80dBNet Weight: 44gOutput Power: 3WMaterial: Plastic/SiliconeFrequency: 50Hz-1800HzProduct Size:47*47*34mmCharging Indicator: Red for charging, off for fully charging.Enlarge phone volume more than 4 timesPlaying time up to 8 housPackage Include:1* Mini Portable Speaker1* Micro USB Charging Cbale1* English User ManualWarranty Policy1 Year Free Warranty, replacement or money back if any problems happen to your speaker during the period of warranty.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Little speaker with loud, quality sound
reviews.reviewText: I use this speaker on my mp3 player and it works really well. The sound is great and I don't have to turn the volume up all the way either. Makes the mp3 player very portable for around the house. Rechargeable too, no batteries to fool with.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It works great for me with my cell phone or kindle fire to listen to music.
reviews.reviewText: I use it as an external speaker on my kindle fire. The bass is great. I listen to music before going to sleep and it works great. It does not fit like a glove so it does come loose easily if you are moving it around. But if it is on a stationary device like I have - it does a great job.I had a prior mini speaker like this one (earlier generation) and the bass was not great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not a bad little speaker at all, but quality leaves something to be desired.
reviews.reviewText: Not a bad product by any means - gets the job done. Sound quality quickly tapers at very high volumes, though to some extent this is expected. If you a product like this - IE, a small detachable speaker - I would recommend this one for sure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Damage to your aux (3.5mm) jack if simultaneously plugged in with USB
reviews.reviewText: Damage to your aux (3.5mm) jack could happen to you like it did to me.The wiring in this speaker has some sort of short in it. Normally, the power conducted through a 3.5mm audio jack would not be enough to damage the jack, but this speaker charges through a USB-A cable, and something shoddy is happening on that end. Whatever juice it's drawing from that source is unshielded and intense, enough to create a sudden and ear-piercing squeal through the speaker when that USB-A port is right next to the aux jack, as it is on most laptops and desktops. And when that happened to me, it instantly fried the L side of stereo on that aux jack, permanently, forcing a replacement.Buyer beware!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Amplifies Sound Well
reviews.reviewText: We've bought four of these. 2 of the 4 have lots of static while plugged in/playing. Disappointing, but we try to keep the 2 good ones charged and ready to play.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Little Speaker
reviews.reviewText: Great little speaker. Has a great loud sound for such a small speaker. Great clarity. I use it for my IPAD. Can be used for a laptop also. Great battery life. You will not regret this purchase if you really need a small sized speaker and do not want to lug around a larger external speaker.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I don't usually write reviews but this deserves one. I listen to YouTube videos and other things when I'm outdoors, and my regular android phone speaker is not loud enough. I decided to order this speaker and for the low price, it's fantastic. The speaker is stylish and small enough to carry around. The sound quality is excellent for the small size and it's very easy to hear everything clearly from my phone. I'm going to order a second one just to have in my car when I need it.
